video_prompt: A colossal glowing portal emits shimmering particles amidst billowing sand waves and airborne debris. A lone, cloaked figure stands, garment subtly disturbed by the originating force, looking up at the dynamic luminous spectacle.
image_prompt: A lone figure in a flowing cloak stands in a desert, looking up at a colossal, glowing golden-orange circular light portal. Massive waves of swirling sand and debris billow outwards from the portal under a hazy sky, with dark, irregular shapes scattered above. The scene is dramatic and epic, with dynamic lighting and an earthy color palette.
refined_video_prompt: A colossal portal pulsates, glowing intensely as it emits shimmering particles. Sand waves surge and recede, carrying airborne debris that swirls and scatters. A lone, cloaked figure's garment ripples and shifts, pulled by the portal's emanating force, as their gaze tracks the fluctuating light.
